page.title: 07Local Government.
page.content: There are two councils in Sidmouth, the{East Devon District Council}and the{Sidmouth Town Council. Over 300 people work at the{East {Devon District Council}offices in 12 committees and 4 departments. This includes clerks and solicitors and the areas of Health, Housing, Engineering, Planning and Finance. The Council gives planning permission and helps people to start shops, cafes and hotels. { Sidmouth Town Council}comprises 19 Councillors who are elected to their posts. The Town Council cleans the town and keeps the old houses preserved. The Town Council owns a lot of the land in the area. It helps the District Council in various ways, for example with Sidmouth's entry to the {Britain In Bloom}competition and with the{Folk Festival.
